    • Constructor Detail

      • FuzzyAprioriProcess

        public FuzzyAprioriProcess(myDataset dataset,
                           boolean useMaxForOneFrequentItemsets,
                           double minSupport,
                           double minConfidence)

        It creates a new process for the algorithm by setting up its parameters

        Parameters:
        dataset - The instance of the dataset for dealing with its records
        useMaxForOneFrequentItemsets - It indicates whether the max operator must be used while discovering 1-Frequent Itemsets
        minSupport - The user-specified minimum support for the mined association rules
        minConfidence - The user-specified minimum confidence for the mined association rules

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()

        It runs the algorithm for mining association rules

      • getRulesSet

        public java.util.ArrayList<AssociationRule> getRulesSet()

        It returns a rules set once the algorithm has been carried out

        Returns:
        An array of association rules having both minimum confidence and support

      • printReport

        public void printReport(java.util.ArrayList<AssociationRule> rules)

        It prints out on screen relevant information regarding the mined association rules

        Parameters:
        rules - The array of association rules from which gathering relevant information

      • getNumberOfOneFrequentItemsets

        public int getNumberOfOneFrequentItemsets()

        It returns the number of 1-Frequent Itemsets

        Returns:
        A value representing the number of 1-Frequent Itemsets
